items.question: What's included in the €99/month price?
items.answer: The plan includes all features: POS, ordering, QR menu, reservations, delivery, kitchen display, reports and 24/7 support. No additional fees or hidden costs.

items.question: Do I need to buy special hardware?
items.answer: No. Qamarero works on any tablet, mobile or computer. You can use the equipment you already have or we'll recommend affordable options.

items.question: How does technical support work?
items.answer: We offer 24/7 support via chat, email and phone. Our team consists of hospitality experts who understand your business.

items.question: Can I cancel anytime?
items.answer: Yes, no commitment. You can cancel your subscription at any time from your dashboard.
